text: Marta Lucía Ramírez Blanco (born 4 July 1954) is a Colombian lawyer and politician. She was the Vice President of Colombia from 2018 to 2022. She was also the Minister of Foreign Affairs of Colombia from 2021 to 2022. She is the first woman elected Vice President. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Ambassadors of Colombia Category:Vice presidents of Colombia Category:21st-century Roman Catholics
title: Marta Lucía Ramírez
